remarks: Lemma used for derivation of the completeness axiom ~ ax-hcompl from ZFC Hilbert space theory.  The first 5 hypotheses would be satisfied by the definitions described in ~ ax-hilex ; the 6th would be satisfied by ~ eqid ; the 7th by a given fixed Hilbert space; and the last by theorem ~ hlcompl .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hilcompl.1 $e |- ~H = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
hilcompl.2 $e |- +h = ( +v ` U ) $.
hilcompl.3 $e |- .h = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
hilcompl.4 $e |- .ih = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
hilcompl.5 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
hilcompl.6 $e |- J = ( MetOpen ` D ) $.
hilcompl.7 $e |- U e. CHilOLD $.
hilcompl.8 $e |- ( F e. ( Cau ` D ) -> E. x e. ~H F ( ~~>t ` J ) x ) $.
hilcompl $p |- ( F e. Cauchy -> E. x e. ~H F ~~>v x ) $.
$d F x $.
